summary: When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.
cast: Stanley Tucci|Hope Davis|Pat McNamara|Anne Meara|Parker Posey|Liev Schreiber|Stephanie Venditto|Campbell Scott|Marc Grapey|Douglas McGrath|Jill Rowe|Andy Brown|Paul Herman|Amy Stiller|Peter Askin|Marcia Haufrecht|Carol Locatell|Marcia Gay Harden|Adam Davidson|Tracey Barry|Ford Evanson|Greg Mottola|John Mottola|Rik Walters
title: The Daytrippers
